reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Wave Energy Feasibility for Indonesia - WEFFI

description.narrative: The purpose of the project is to enable the development of wave energy in Indonesia and market entry of the WaveRoller wave energy conversion technology in Indonesia. The main target of the project is to create an SPV company in Indonesia with a local part ner to develop an initial wave energy market pilot project in Indonesia. Finnpartnership funding will be applied for identifying and establishing business partnerships the relevant local actors and for conducting a detailed feasibility study for WaveRoller technology in Indonesia. Partner search will include visits to Indonesia to meet with local private and public entities which have interest in ownership or integrator roles pertaining to development of wave energy and the WaveRoller technology. A large po rtion of the WaveRoller units can be fabricated locally thus finding a dependable local manufacturer is essential. In addition local know-how and participation is essential in the feasibility study phase in particular pertaining to; wave resource measureme nts bathymetric measurements review of related local legislation and preliminary assessments of environmental and socio-economic impacts of a potential WaveRoller project.The first phase of the feasibility study is a desktop analysis to locate potential Wa veRoller project sites. The sites are ranked and most potential locations are selected to be further evaluated in detail. The detailed feasibility study will include multiple visits for conducting on-site measurements and the creation of initial wave energ y project plans. Legislative and legal risk analysis is conducted in order to investigate the possible legal barriers. An assessment of environmental feasibility study is also required and undertaken to ensure the risk of potential environmental impacts is minimized.Following the partner search and the detailed feasibility study the target of the project is to establish a company in Indonesia for the purpose of developing and executing wave energy projects in the country.
